title: paraamukham Enaiyya
sahitya:
paraamukhamEnaiyaa aDimayin



(paraamuka)







anupallavi







araavaNai tuyilum muraari paNi tiri



puraariyE aruL taraamalinnum



(paraamuka)







caraNam







daaraNiyul piRavaavaram arLum



kaaraNa viraat purushanadumoolaa



daarakshEtramenum tiruvaarooraanE



raamadaasan paNiharanE



(paraamuka)
